com.mygdx.game

Class Door

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion
      • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
        • com.mygdx.game.LevelObject
          • com.mygdx.game.Tile
            • com.mygdx.game.Interactable
              • com.mygdx.game.Door

  • public class Door
extends Interactable
    This class represents the door allowing a door object to be instanced and allows its state of being opened or closed to be changed by other objects.
